title: Vert: Trail running training

creator: Vert Run Inc
descriptionHtml:
Vert.run: the #1 trail and ultrarunning app on the market. Designed for trail runners, by trail runners. Flexible, adaptable, personalized training plans for your next trail running goal. Track your progress, get stronger and join our community of runners all over the world by participating in one of our free weekly challenges.

-Train for your first trail race, half marathon or up to 20 miles for free
-Train like a pro for distances up to 100 miles with our 100+ training programs designed by world class athletes with our Explore subscription
-Personal coaching experience and weekly feedback from your coach with our Explore programs
-Strength for runners and cross training
-Track your progress
-Plan your calendar and goals
-Global challenges and virtual races
-Earn badges and compete with trail runners from all around the world
-Join our community, “The Trailhead”
-Sync your activities with Strava, Suunto and Garmin Connect

TRAIN FOR FREE UP TO 32K.
New to the trails? Want to get fit to spend more time outdoors? Or maybe you want to train for a half marathon? Vert.run is a free trail running app with training programs up to 20 miles. No matter your experience level, there’s a Vert.run plan for you.

TRAIN LIKE A PRO WITH OUR 100+ TRAINING PROGRAMS DESIGNED BY WORLD CLASS ATHLETES WITH OUR EXPLORE SUBSCRIPTION
Want to run your first ultramarathon? Or train for a 100 mile race? We have 100+ training programs designed by world class ultra trail runners, which all include weekly feedback from your coach. Training that works around your life--not the other way around.
Unlock all the benefits of using Vert run including: a customized training plan, tips, inspiration and advice from our community and our coaches, swap workouts around your schedule anytime, repeat a training week if you miss key workouts and add a recovery block anytime you need it.

STRENGTH TRAINING FOR RUNNERS AND CROSS TRAINING
Tired of getting injured every time you up your mileage? Prevent running injuries with our strength training routines specifically designed for trail and ultra runners. Just using your body weight, you’ll stay injury-free with our great content and routines for ankle strengthening, core and mobility.

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
See your weekly stats including distance, time, elevation gain and cross training activities. Follow your progress throughout your training program and stay on track to reach your goal.

PLAN YOUR CALENDAR AND GOALS
Add your races or challenges and categorize them with priorities. Stay motivated with all your goals in one place.

GLOBAL CHALLENGES AND VIRTUAL RACES
Each week, we have a different free challenge for you to try. Whether you want to hit a certain vertical gain in a week of running or simply run your half marathon PR, plan ahead and challenge yourself against trail runners all over the world.

EARN BADGES AND COMPETE WITH TRAIL RUNNERS FROM AROUND THE WORLD
Each week, we have a different challenge for you to try. Whether you want to hit a certain vertical gain in a week of running or run your half marathon PR, plan ahead and challenge yourself against trail runners from all over the world...and engage in some friendly competition to earn a badge when you finish a challenge.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY “THE TRAILHEAD”
Join our in-house community and get inspired by other trail runners all over the world.

SYNC YOUR ACTIVITIES WITH STRAVA, SUUNTO & GARMIN CONNECT
Use your favorite activity tracker to upload your activities directly to Vert.run. We're compatible with Suunto, Garmin Connect and Strava so you can easily sync all your activities.

Find our full terms, conditions, and privacy policy at:
https://vert.run/terminos_condiciones/

title: Vert: Trail & Ultra Running

creator: Vert Run Inc
descriptionHtml:
Vert.run: the go-to worldwide app for trail and ultra runners of all kinds. Designed for trail runners, by trail runners. The Vert.run App is the hub for all your trail running needs: find free training programs, affordable coaching, a free GPS running tracker, and inspirational (and informative!) trail running content. Our mission is to make trail running accessible to everybody, everywhere–that’s why we built Vert.run!

Training I GPS Tracking | Challenges I Community

APP FEATURES:

-Train for your first trail run (5k) up to a trail marathon (42k) for FREE with one of our high-quality free training programs, which include easy-to-read workouts and follow-along training videos.

-Train for your first 50k ultramarathon or all the way up to a 100 mile distance with one of our Explore programs designed by professional ultrarunners. You also get a Vert.run coach and personalized feedback to guide you along the way with our Explore subscription, which costs just $25/month (seriously!)

-Sync your activities with Strava, Suunto, Garmin–or use our free, built-in GPS tracker to record your workouts and see all of your training stats in one place to reach your goals.

-Join our in-house community, “The Trailhead” and share your workouts with videos and photos, and stay connected and inspired.

-Access our informative trail and ultrarunning content; from strength and core workout video routines to nutrition tips and recovery exercises, we’ve got the tools to keep you injury free.

-Compete with trail runners from all over the world in our free monthly challenges.

TRAIN FOR FREE UP TO A 42K MARATHON DISTANCE.
New to the trails? Want to get fit to spend more time outdoors? Vert.run is the #1 free trail running app. No matter your experience level, we have a training plan for you.

WANT TO RUN YOUR FIRST ULTRA? TRAIN WITH ONE OF OUR PROGRAMS DESIGNED BY WORLD-CLASS ULTRARUNNERS AND GET A VERT.RUN COACH INCLUDED WITH YOUR SUBSCRIPTION.

Start training with the best app for trail runners!

creator: Vert Run Inc
descriptionHtml:
Vert.run: the ultimate app for trail and road runners. Designed for runners, by runners. The Vert.run App is your hub for all running needs: discover free training programs, affordable coaching, and inspiring running content. Our mission is to make running accessible to everyone, everywhere–that’s why we built Vert.run!

COACHING I COMMUNITY I CONTENT

APP FEATURES:

- Integration with Apple Health Kit, Strava, Suunto, Garmin, and Coros: Import your training and activities tracked with your Apple Watch and other compatible devices. Here you can sync and track your progress.

- COACH-MONITORED IMPROVEMENT: Every week your coach will review your training and make adjustments if needed, to ensure the best training journey for your next goal.

- BOOST CONFIDENCE AND RACE READINESS: with our specialized stats and tools to track your training progress.

-FREE TRAINING PLANS: Train for your first trail run (5k) up to a marathon (42k) for free with high-quality programs, including easy-to-read workouts and follow-along training videos.

-ADAPTIVE TO YOUR SCHEDULE: you can move workouts, add a recovery week, increase or decrease the training load of your plan and more.

-ULTRA MARATHON TRAINING: Train for a 50k ultramarathon or up to a 100-mile distance with Explore programs designed by professional ultrarunners. Get a Vert.run coach and personalized feedback with our Explore subscription for just $25/month.

- JOIN A GLOBAL COMMUNITY: Join our in-house community, “The Trailhead,” share workouts with videos and photos, and stay connected and inspired.
Informative Content: Access running content, including strength and core workout videos, nutrition tips, and recovery exercises to keep you injury-free.

- TRAIN FOR FREE UP TO A 42K MARATHON DISTANCE. New to running? Vert.run is the #1 free running app. Regardless of experience level, we have a training plan for you.

- RUN YOUR FIRST ULTRA WITH WORLD-CLASS PROGRAMS. From your first 50k to 100 miles in the mountains, we offer 100+ training programs by world-class ultra trail runners for all levels. Subscription includes a Vert.run coach.

- CUSTOMIZED TRAINING THAT FITS YOUR LIFE. Unlock the benefits of Vert.run with our Explore subscription: a customized training program, coach feedback, flexible workout schedules, and the ability to add recovery weeks anytime. Enjoy stress-free training.

- STRENGTH AND CORE WORKOUT VIDEOS FOR RUNNERS. Prevent injuries with strength training video routines for trail and road runners. Stay injury-free with routines for ankle strengthening, mobility, and more.

- GLOBAL CHALLENGES. Participate in free challenges to stay sharp and inspired. Challenge yourself with vertical gains or marathon PRs and compete with runners worldwide to earn badges.

NEW FEATURES:
Chat directly with your coach
Plans by world-class athletes, for all levels
Hundreds of plans for every level and goal
Easy-to-follow workouts
Adaptive plans to your schedule
Personalize your plan
Sync and track progress
Coach-monitored improvement
Runner-designed stats
Boost confidence and race readiness
Join a global running community

Find our full terms, conditions, and privacy policy at: https://vert.run/terminos_condiciones/

title:
Vert: Run & Trailrunning Coach
3.9.2

creator: Vert Run Inc
descriptionHtml:
Vert.run is the leading training and coaching app designed specifically for trail and ultra runners of all levels. Whether you’re training for your first 5K on trails, preparing for a challenging 100-mile ultra, or simply looking to improve your endurance and mountain running skills, Vert.run provides expert-designed training plans, real-time progress tracking, and direct access to world-class coaches.

Unlike generic running apps, Vert.run focuses entirely on trail running, ultra marathons, and mountain endurance training—helping you navigate the unique challenges of elevation gain, technical terrain, and long-distance endurance. Our plans are created in collaboration with some of the best trail and ultra runners in the world, ensuring that you get expert-backed training and proven performance strategies to reach your goals.

With adaptable training plans, in-app coach messaging, and features designed to fit your lifestyle, Vert.run is the only app that provides both structured training and the flexibility you need to balance running with everyday life.

Key Features:
Train Smarter, Not Harder – Get personalized training plans tailored to your experience, race goals, and available time. Whether you're a beginner or an elite athlete, Vert.run ensures you're training at the right intensity to maximize progress.

Adjust Your Plan to Fit Your Life – Life happens! Easily swap workouts, add an easy week, restart a training week, or customize your sessions to make your training fit your schedule. Your plan adapts to you—not the other way around.

Chat with Your Coach – Receive personalized, human coaching and expert guidance from experienced trail and ultra-running professionals. Message your coach directly from the app to get feedback, ask training questions, and stay on track.

Elite-Level Training Plans – Our training plans are designed in collaboration with world-class trail runners and ultra marathon champions. These plans aren’t just theoretical—they are battle-tested by elite athletes to help you perform at your best.

Progress Tracking & Performance Metrics – Monitor your fitness improvements, track your weekly training volume, and use Vert.run’s unique Mountain Index to gauge your readiness for races with elevation gain and technical terrain.

Seamless Integration with Your Favorite Devices – Sync your workouts with Strava, Garmin, Suunto, and Coros, so your training data stays in one place. Easily track your runs, elevation gain, and training progress.

Race-Specific Training – Whether you're training for a 100-mile ultra, a mountain marathon, a vertical kilometer, or your first trail race, we have plans tailored to your event distance, elevation, and terrain type.

Community & Support – Join a global community of trail runners from over 100+ countries, connect with like-minded athletes, and stay motivated with our interactive coaching experience.

Vert.run is built for trail and ultra runners who need a coaching solution that is flexible, expert-backed, and specifically designed for off-road endurance training. Whether you're training for a bucket-list race or simply want to explore trails with more confidence, this is the coaching app that will help you unlock your full potential.

Why Trail Runners Choose Vert.run?
✅ Designed for Trail & Ultra Runners – Unlike generic running apps, Vert.run is built for mountain running, off-road endurance training, and ultra-marathon preparation.

✅ Personalized Coaching & Human Support – Get real guidance from professional trail running coaches, not just algorithms.

✅ Proven Training Methods from World-Class Athletes – Learn from the best, with plans created by elite runners who have competed in the toughest races on Earth.

✅ Flexible Training That Fits Your Life – Adapt your training to your schedule with easy-to-use modifications.

✅ Seamless Syncing & Tracking – Connect with Garmin, Suunto, Strava, and Coros to keep all your workouts in one place.

Download Vert.run Today!
